table.name: vtiger_pm
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_pm` ( `pmid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `pm_subject` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pmid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_pmcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_pmcf` ( `pmid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`pmid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
